summary: An Ordinance repealing Ordinance No. 33445, entitled, "An Ordinance providing for the laying off, extending, opening and establishing of Fourteenth Avenue South, from Greeley Street to the south line of Section Twenty-nine (29), Township Twenty-four (24) North, Range Four (4) East, W. M., providing for the condemnation, appropriation, taking and damaging of land and other property necessary therefor; and providing that the entire costs of said improvement shall be paid by special assessment upon the property specially benefited, in the manner pro-vided by law," approved August 3, 1914, directing the Corporation Counsel to dismiss Cause No. 107,445 in the Superior Court instituted under said ordinance, and providing for the payment of costs.
